name: Sergio Baradat
biography:
1983 - BFA, Illustration, Parsons School of Design
Since 1983 - Designer and Illustrator for magazine and newspaper clients, including Adweek, Bloomberg, Business Week, Details, Fast Co., The New York Times, Vanity Fair, etc. 
Produced over thirty book covers for Anchor, Chronicle, Doubleday, Harper Collins, Kensington Books, Random House, Simon & Schuster, Scribners, etc.
Designed/ illustrated album covers and posters for Arista, Motown, Phillips, Polygram, Rhino and Sony.
Since 1991 - Has taught in Department of Illustration, Parsons School of Design.
Since 1996 - Has created electronic art on the computer and lectured on the subject.
Has received awards from various organizations, including the AIGA, Art Directors Clubs of Los Angeles and New York, Print Magazine, Communication Arts, American Illustration, etc.
